Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>You might not wanna go to that <clr:0000>restaurant<clr:ffff>
over there. You probably shouldn't go to
<clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff> either.
Ever since the <clr:0000>marbled rock roast <clr:ffff>showed
up, everyone's been actin' funny...

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Big Bro was so happy to get into
<clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>, but now it's like he doesn't
even care. <sp:5:0:0>He's like a stranger to me...
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Yeah, you know... The team that digs up
ore round here and sells it and stuff.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Big Bro was always feeling proud about
the growth in Goron City, saying it's all
thanks to YunoboCo.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But ever since they started selling
<clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>, the whole city's
been feeling weird...
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000><snd:Happy_00><clr:ffff>Yeah! They're the yummy rocks that
<clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff> sells now. They're like...
everywhere!
You can find them in the caves around
here—kinda all over the place lately.
Everyone says they're SUPER tasty...
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But they're so hard and crunchy that us
kids and elders can't eat them—our teeth
can't handle that crunch...
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Not even his eyes look the same anymore.
It's like he was never my Big Bro at all...
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000><snd:Happy_00><clr:ffff>They're the yummy rocks that <clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>
sells now. They're like...everywhere!

You can find them in the caves around
here—kinda all over the place lately.
Everyone says they're SUPER tasty...
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But they're so hard and crunchy that us
kids and elders can't eat them—our teeth
can't handle that crunch...
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>His eyes are normal, and HE'S normal
again too!

Back to his big dream of eating a lava
feast of <clr:0000>rock roast<clr:ffff>!
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Lava feast!


I have no idea what that even means,
but it's Big Bro's dream, so I want it
to happen!
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>It's the tastiest rock! Every Goron
everywhere loves it!<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>You used to be able to get it all over <clr:0000>in
the caves around here<clr:ffff>...

<sp:3:0:2:0701>But Big Bro says that it's tricky to get to
where it's located these days.

So that's why he wants to strike it big and
find whole bunches of it!
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Are you a traveler?


You might not wanna go to that <clr:0000>restaurant<clr:ffff>
over there. You probably shouldn't go to
<clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff> either.
Ever since the <clr:0000>marbled rock roast <clr:ffff>showed
up, everyone's been actin' funny...

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Big Bro was so happy to get into
<clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff> too, but now it's like he doesn't
even care. <sp:5:0:0>He feels like a stranger to me...
